entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
